thread.title: Trazee Travel Honors EVA As Favorite Asian Airline Carrier rises to the top in first-annual Trazees
thread.title_full: Trazee Travel Honors EVA As Favorite Asian Airline Carrier rises to the top in first-annual Trazees

author: Chisa Boonmee
title: Trazee Travel Honors EVA As Favorite Asian Airline Carrier rises to the top in first-annual Trazees
text:
Email 
EVA Air was honored as the Favorite Asian Airline in Trazee Travel’s first-annual awards program, staged in Orlando, FL on Tuesday, July 28, 2015. 
This award follows a series of honors EVA has received this year. SKYTRAX ranked it as one of the “World’s Top-10 Best Airlines” and the number one airline for “Best Airline Cabin Cleanliness” for 2015. AirlineRatings.com recognized it as a carrier of choice for 2015 among the “World’s Top-10 Airlines” and Germany’s AERO International Magazine rated it third among the world’s safest airlines. Bookings and information about EVA’s award-winning services and products can be found at www.evaair.com. 
Trazee editors and staff collected nominations from the web publication’s contributors and invited readers to submit favorites using online ballots. A panel of Trazee and parent FX Express Publications management analyzed nominations and selected the winners. By being singled out as the Favorite Asian Airline, EVA joins a select group of other leading airlines, airports, hotels and destinations to win kudos from Trazee Travel’s millennial-generation staff, contributors and readers. 
The web publication, www.trazeetravel.com , is written for and by travelers aged 18-35 and includes content that covers everything related to travel from A to Z. Share this:
